data.description: Manage an equivalence relation on a set
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I am working on a module for weighted finite-state transducers,
    which I hope to be able to publish soon. During the development I
    ran into the need of managing equivalence classes, and thought about
    the class UnionFind data structure. It doesn't appear that anything
    related is currently available on CPAN, so I made one that I'd like
    to propose. I will try to see if people are interested in it on
    comp.lang.perl.modules, and once it's been used a bit, propose it
    for upload to CPAN.
